# CPTextButtonStyle.confirm

**Case**

A style that indicates the button confirms an action and changes data.

## Declaration

```swift
case confirm
```

## Button Text Styles

- **CPTextButtonStyle.normal**: A style that indicates the button performs an action other than to confirm or cancel.
- **CPTextButtonStyle.cancel**: A style that indicates the button cancels an action and doesn’t change data.
